contentrichtext.text: '''Judgment Day''' is another name for the '''[[Last Judgment]]''' in the Abrahamic religions of Judaism, Christianity, and Islam '''Judgment Day''' or '''Judgement Day''' may also refer to: ==Film and television== *[[Judgement Day (TV series)|''Judgement Day'' (TV series)]], a short-lived UK TV game show hosted by comedian Brian Conley *"Judgement Day", an episode of the TV series ''[[Midsomer Murders]]'' *[[Judgment Day (1999 film)|''Judgment Day'' (1999 film)]], a 1999 American science-fiction/action film *[[Judgement Day (2013 film)|''Judgement Day'' (2013 film)]], a 2013 Singaporean film *[[Judgment Day (NCIS)|"Judgment Day" (''NCIS'')]], the fifth-season finale of the TV series ''NCIS'' *[[Judgment Day (television)|''Judgment Day'' (television)]], a video game review television show on G4 *[[Terminator (franchise)#Judgment Day|Judgment Day (''Terminator'' franchise)]], a date in the ''Terminator'' science fiction franchise, and the second film ''[[Terminator 2: Judgment Day]]'' *[[Judgment Day (The Outer Limits)|"Judgment Day" (''The Outer Limits'')]], an episode of ''The Outer Limits'' *"Judgment Day", an episode of the TV series ''[[Highlander (franchise)]]'' *"Judgment Day", the final episode of ''[[Batman: The Animated Series]]'' *"[[Judgment Day: Intelligent Design on Trial]]", a 2007 ''Nova'' documentary on intelligent design *[[WWE Judgment Day]], a pay-per-view event held by World Wrestling Entertainment ==Literature== *[[Judgment Day (comics)]], a number of comic book series or stories *[[Judgment Day (short story)|"Judgment Day" (short story)]], a science fiction story by L. Sprague de Camp *[[Judgement Day (short story)]], a Southern Gothic story by Flannery O'Connor *[[Judgment Day (novel)|''Judgment Day'' (novel)]], a novel by [[Penelope Lively]] *[[Judgment Day (novel)|''Judgment Day'' (novel)]], a 1999 novel by [[Jane Jensen]] (originally titled ''Millennium Rising'') *''Judgment Day'' a play by [[Elmer Rice]] *''[[Judgment Day: My Years with Ayn Rand]]'', a memoir by Nathaniel Branden *''[[Judgment Day (novel)]]'', a novel by James T. Farrell, and the conclusion to Farrell's ''Studs Lonigan'' trilogy ==Music== * [[Judgement Day (album)|''Judgement Day'' (album)]], a 1992 album by Esham *[[Judgement Day (band)]], American String Metal band * [[Judgment Day (song)|"Judgment Day" (song)]], a 1989 song by Whitesnake * [[Judgement Day (Balzac album)|''Judgement Day'' (Balzac album)]], a 2000 album by [[Balzac]] * [[Judgement Day (Pooh-Man album)|''Judgement Day'' (Pooh-Man album)]], a 1993 album by [[Pooh-Man]] * [[Judgement Day (Sinner album)|''Judgement Day'' (Sinner album)]], a 1997 album by [[Sinner (band)|Sinner]] *''[[Tical 2000: Judgement Day]]'', a 1998 album by [[Method Man]] * [[Lightning Strikes Again|"Judgment Day" (song)]] , a 2008 song by Dokken * "Judgement Day" (song), a 1991 song by Van Halen ==See also== *[[Judgment (disambiguation)]] *{{lookfrom|Judgment Day}} *{{lookfrom|Judgement Day}} {{disambig}}
